definition: a victim of ridicule or pranks, act as a stooge, in a compliant or subordinate manner
details:
noun
- a victim of ridicule or pranks
= synonyms: goat
- a person of unquestioning obedience
= synonyms: flunky, flunkey, yes-man, yes man
verb
- act as a stooge, in a compliant or subordinate manner
= example: act as a stooge, in a compliant or subordinate manner
- act as the stooge
= example: act as the stooge
- cruise in slow or routine flights
